title: Workspace: Migration plan (non-destructive)
description: Produces a plan for standardizing layout without moving files automatically.

with.text:
# Workspace Migration Plan

## Goals
- Standardize to apps/ and libs/
- Minimize moving/renaming

## Inventory
List current projects, their build files, and dependencies.

## Proposed mapping
- Map each project into apps/ or libs/

## Steps
- Move in small batches
- Verify build/test each batch using Settings
